thread.title: 2016 TRB Annual Meeting: Final Program Advertising Deadline is November 14
thread.title_full: 2016 TRB Annual Meeting: Final Program Advertising Deadline is November 14

title: 2016 TRB Annual Meeting: Final Program Advertising Deadline is November 14
text: 2016 TRB Annual Meeting: Final Program Advertising Deadline is November 14 Text Size: 2016 TRB Annual Meeting: Final Program Advertising Deadline is November 14 http://events.jspargo.com/trb16/public/enter.aspx 173294 2016 TRB Annual Meeting: Final Program Advertising Deadline is November 14 Act now to secure an advertisement in the 2016 TRB 95th Annual Meeting Final Program. Advertising space must be secured by Friday, November 14 and artwork submitted by December 1. Advertising in the Annual Meeting Final Program--circulation nearly 12,000--allows your organization to showcase its products and services, and to show support for transportation research and innovation at the TRB 95th Annual Meeting, January 10-14, 2016, in Washington, D.C. If your organization is interested in advertising, get additional information and reserve your space online or contact Bradley Eubank at Bradley.Eubank@jspargo.com or 703-995-2562. Final Program advertising prices begin at $1,400. The inside back cover of the program is still available. Enrollment for the patron program , with a wide range of benefits, remains open. The 95th TRB Annual Meeting takes place January 10-14, 2016, at the Walter E. Washington Convention Center, in Washington, D.C. The meeting covers all transportation issues, with more than 5,000 presentations in nearly 750 sessions. A number of sessions and workshops will focus on the meetingâ€™s spotlight theme: Research Convergence for a Multi-Modal Future. The meeting is expected to attract more than 12,000 transportation professionals from throughout the United States and 70 other countries.   10/8/2015
